title: The West
creator_credit: Jody Abramson, Michael Kantor, Stephen Ives, Florentine Films, Insignia Films, Time-Life Video & Television and WETA-TV
brief_description: A historical account through to 1914 of the American West presented as an eight-part documentary series for television. Includes archival footage, stills, newsreels, diaries and artefacts, and commentary by historians, writers and anthropologists (American and Native American), with spectacular images of the landscape and haunting background music. Narrated by Peter Coyote.
creator_credit_for_label: Jody Abramson, Michael Kantor, Stephen Ives, Florentine Films, Insignia Films, Time-Life Video & Television and WETA-TV
